results.prompt:
Give me a clear, step-by-step recipe for Vegetarian Lasagne.
Include ingredients and cooking instructions.
Return your output strictly in the following format:
{"ingredients": ["ingredient 1", "ingredient 2", ...], "steps": ["step 1", "step 2", ...]}
Do not include any text outside this JSON object.
results.output: {"ingredients": ["8 lasagna sheets", "1 medium onion, chopped", "2 cloves of garlic, minced", "2 cups mixed mushrooms (button, cremini, shiitake)", "1 cup frozen spinach, thawed and drained", "1 cup ricotta cheese", "1 cup grated mozzarella cheese", "1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese", "1 tsp dried basil", "1 tsp dried oregano", "Salt and pepper to taste", " Olive oil for greasing"], "steps": ["Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with olive oil.", "In a large skillet, heat some olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.", "Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, stirring constantly to prevent burning.", "Add the mixed mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start browning, about 5-7 minutes.", "Stir in the thawed spinach, salt, pepper, dried basil, and dried oregano. Cook for an additional 2 minutes.", "In a large bowl, combine the ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, and parmesan cheese. Mix well to combine.", "Spread a layer of the mushroom-spinach mixture at the bottom of the prepared baking dish.", "Arrange 4 lasagna sheets on top of the mushroom layer.", "Spread half of the ricotta-mozzarella-parmesan mixture over the lasagna sheets.", "Repeat the layers, starting with the mushroom-spinach mixture, then the remaining lasagna sheets, and finally the remaining ricotta-mozzarella-parmesan mixture.", "Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes.", "Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.", "Let the lasagna rest for 10-15 minutes before slicing and serving."]}

results.prompt:
Give me a clear, step-by-step recipe for Pepperoni Pizza.
Include ingredients and cooking instructions.
Return your output strictly in the following format:
{"ingredients": ["ingredient 1", "ingredient 2", ...], "steps": ["step 1", "step 2", ...]}
Do not include any text outside this JSON object.
results.output: {"ingredients": ["1 lb pizza dough", "1 cup tomato sauce", "8 oz mozzarella cheese", "8 slices pepperoni", "1 tsp dried oregano", "1 tsp garlic powder"], "steps": ["Step 1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).", "Step 2: Roll out the pizza dough into a circle or rectangle shape, about 12 inches in diameter.", "Step 3: Spread the tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.", "Step 4: Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the sauce.", "Step 5: Arrange the pepperoni slices on top of the cheese.", "Step 6: Sprinkle the dried oregano and garlic powder over the pepperoni.", "Step 7: Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.", "Step 8: Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving."]}

results.prompt:
Give me a clear, step-by-step recipe for Chicken Burger.
Include ingredients and cooking instructions.
Return your output strictly in the following format:
{"ingredients": ["ingredient 1", "ingredient 2", ...], "steps": ["step 1", "step 2", ...]}
Do not include any text outside this JSON object.
results.output: {"ingredients": ["1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast", "1/2 cup finely chopped onion", "1/4 cup finely chopped bell pepper", "1 minced garlic clove", "1 tablespoon olive oil", "1 teaspoon salt", "1/2 teaspoon black pepper", "1/4 teaspoon paprika", "4 hamburger buns", "4 lettuce leaves", "4 tomato slices", "4 cheese slices (optional)", "Mayonnaise or ketchup"], "steps": ["Step 1: In a large bowl, combine the chopped onion, bell pepper, garlic, salt, black pepper, and paprika. Mix well.", "Step 2: Add the chicken breast to the bowl and mix until the chicken is evenly coated with the spice mixture.", "Step 3: Divide the chicken mixture into 4 equal parts and shape each part into a patty.", "Step 4: Heat the olive oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the patties for about 5-6 minutes on each side, or until they are cooked through.", "Step 5: Meanwhile, toast the hamburger buns by placing them on the oven rack of a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for about 2-3 minutes.", "Step 6: Assemble the burgers by spreading mayonnaise or ketchup on the bottom bun, followed by a lettuce leaf, a tomato slice, a cheese slice (if using), and finally a cooked patty. Top with the top bun.", "Step 7: Serve immediately and enjoy!"]}
